protectedBrowsing.title: Protected Browsing
protectedBrowsing.description: Some actions are limited to keep our company’s data safe from getting lost or stolen.
protectedBrowsing.descriptionWithNoFeaturePolicies:
Keeping our company’s data safe sometimes requires setting browsing limitations.

If such exist, you’ll see them here.

screenshotProtectionBypass.disabled: To bypass this session and allow <1/> click <3>here<3/>
screenshotProtectionBypass.enabled: Screen capture is allowed due to bypass
screenshotProtectionBypass.enabledTip: Browsing session for this website will end when all tabs of this website are closed

expandableSecureStorageSection.title: Secure storage
expandableSecureStorageSection.description: Store your files in a secure file manager. View, edit and take action in your company browser

expandablePolicyControlSection.title: Policy control
expandablePolicyControlSection.description: Refresh policy to keep your browser up to date with our organizational policy

expandablePolicyInfoSection.title: Policy info
expandablePolicyInfoSection.description: The following section is visible to admins only

SecurityTipsSection.title: Security tips to help remove limitations
SecurityTipsSection.officeNetworkTip: Connect to the secure office network
SecurityTipsSection.antiMalwareTip: Run anti-malware software on your device
